cscie55.hw3

Class Floor

  • java.lang.Object
    • cscie55.hw3.Floor

  • public class Floor
extends java.lang.Object
    The Floor class represents a floor in a multi-story building for the Application.

    • Method Detail

      • generateArrivalsAtThisSecond

        public void generateArrivalsAtThisSecond()
        Defines the passengers residing that decide to leave at this second following these steps:
        1. Set the number of passengers that decide to leave at this second taking a sample from the floor's poisson variable.
        2. Calculate the probability that passengers are heading up or down based on the current floor number, and assuming a Uniform Distribution among the floors.
        P[U = n] = (N - 1 - n) / (N - 1)
        where,
        U : The passengers are heading upwards.
        n : Current floor number, 0 <= n < N.
        N : Number of floors in the building.
        Particularly, P[U = 0] = 1.0, and P[U = N-1] = 0.0.
        AND,
        P[D = n] = (n) / (N - 1) OR SIMPLY (1 - P[U = n])
        where,
        D : The passengers are heading downwards.
        n : Current floor number, 0 <= n < N.
        N : Number of floors in the building.
        Particularly, P[D = 0] = 0.0, and P[D = N-1] = 1.0.

      • unloadPassengers

        public void unloadPassengers(Elevator elevator)
        Unload the elevator's passengers who are destined for this floor, then loads its waiting passengers who are heading towards the same direction onto the elevator. Writes messages accordingly.
        Parameters:
        elevator - The Elevator object to unload and load passengers to

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • generatePassengersResiding

        private void generatePassengersResiding()
        Instantiates and populates the passengers residing collection for this floor with exactly INITIAL_PASSENGERS_RESIDING number of passengers.

      • queuePassengersDestinedUp

        private void queuePassengersDestinedUp()
        Selects passengers residing to go for UP service, sets a random destination floor for each of them, and puts them in the passengersDestinedUp Queue.
        Pre: this.passengersDestinedUpAtThisSecond has been defined.
        Post: Passengers from the passengersResiding Vector have been queued for UP service, currentFloor < destinationfloor <= N-1.

      • queuePassengersDestinedDown

        private void queuePassengersDestinedDown()
        Selects passengers residing to go for DOWN service, sets a random destination floor for each of them, and puts them in the passengersDestinedDown Queue.
        Pre: this.passengersDestinedDownAtThisSecond has been defined.
        Post: Passengers from the passengersResiding Vector have been queued for DOWN service, 0 <= destinationFloor < currentFloor.

      • listPassengers

        private java.lang.String listPassengers(int numberOfPassengers,
                              java.lang.String wordEnding,
                              java.util.Iterator<Passenger> iterator)
        Utility method to show the list of passengers waiting for UP service or list of passengers waiting for DOWN service or list of passengers residing on this floor.
        Parameters:
        numberOfPassengers - Number of passengers to iterate over.
        wordEnding - String to show a nice message.
        iterator - An iterator of any of the collections to examine.
        Returns:
        String A message string to show in the standard output.
